Description: Northgate at Falls Church offers amazing access to the best of the Washington, D.C. area and some of the nation's best schools. This unbeatable community doesn't simply put you close to the excitement and style of D.C., it brings it all to you. Take in a show at the iconic State Theater or try a new restaurant. Work and shop right in the neighborhood, or hop on the metro to meet friends in Arlington's eclectic atmosphere. You'll live just a short walk from the East Falls Church Metro station, the transfer point for the Silver and Orange Lines. Or, stay in to enjoy all the comforts of your home. The chic clubroom with courtyard access is the perfect spot for a cocktail party. Relax by the fireplace, grill on the patio, or work out in the fitness center. Northgate has it all, right here in the Little City. Contact us today for a personal tour!

Description: Welcome to Monticello Falls Church Apartments in Falls Church, VA! Conveniently located on Arlington Blvd/Route 50 for easy access to grocery stores, shops, and a host of restaurants. Spend the afternoon browsing through some of the most renowned art galleries and museums in nearby Washington D.C. or indulge in the freshest ingredients at the year-round farmers market! Falls Church is also home to gorgeous parks and trails, historic buildings, theaters, and cultural centers. With access to all major highways it's easy for the residents of Monticello to get around the city and find something to do that everyone will enjoy! Monticello Falls Church offers studio, one, two, and three bedroom apartment homes. Enjoy life with amenities such as new kitchens with rich wood cabinetry, gas stoves, and sleek steel appliances. Spacious closet space and large picture (energy efficient) windows are an added bonus. Relax at our new pool and sundeck, stay healthy at our fitness studio, or feel accomplished in our business center. Enjoy our complimentary coffee bar while hanging out in our new clubhouse. Entertain friends and family in our grilling or playground areas. Discover Apartment Living At Its Best and reserve your home today!

Description: Merrill House Apartments in Falls Church, Virginia is a smoke free community. Our apartment homes feature fully equipped kitchens, spacious living areas, walk in closets, carpeting and central AC/heat. Select homes have a den, eat in kitchen area, parquet floors and private patio or balcony. Our community offers an outdoor pool with sundeck, a picnic area with barbecue grills, and on site recycling. We are close to I 66, RTE 237, 7 and 338. We are minutes from Tysons Corner, Seven Corners, Baileys Crossroads and Balston Commons as well as parks and recreational areas that offer tennis, bowling, camping, biking, hiking, golfing and boating. Guarantors welcome!

Description: Barcroft View Apartments in Baileys Crossroads in Falls Church, VA offer spacious 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms. Were at the center of everything you need. Very close to many transit options including 6 MetroBuses lines stop here, 10 minutes to major highways I-66, I-395 or the Capital Beltway (I-495/I-95). 5 minutes to grocery stores and everyday shopping. 10-15 minutes to more shopping on Leesburg Pike, Seven Corners area and Tysons Corner. 10 minutes to Mason District Park and Four Mile Run. Apartment features include a large living area with space for lots of furniture, lots of storage throughout, a separate dining area with ceiling fan, large kitchen with pantry and window, natural light from large windows (we provide blinds throughout), great views of landscaped courtyards or the woods, central heat & air conditioning. Gas and electricity are included in your rent  you pay water/sewer. Cats are welcome. Property features include a relaxing pool with sundeck, play area with picnic tables, laundry and mail delivery inside each building, on-site management and 24-hour emergency maintenance. For more information and availability, visit www.barcroftview.com.

Description: Barcroft Plaza Apartments near Baileys Crossroads in Falls Church, VA offers large studio, 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms. Were at the center of everything you need. Very close to many transit options including 6 MetroBus lines that stop here. 10 minutes to major highways I-66, I-395 or the Capital Beltway (I-495/I-95). 5 minutes to grocery stores and endless everyday shopping and dining. 10-15 minutes to more shopping on Leesburg Pike, Seven Corners area and Tysons Corner. 10 minutes to Mason District Park and Four Mile Run. Utilities not included in rent  you pay gas, electricity, water/sewer. Cats are welcome. Property features include a relaxing pool, play area, picnic area, laundry and mail delivery in each building, on-site management and 24-hour emergency maintenance. For more information and availability, visit www.barcroftplazaapartments.com.

Description:
Newly renovated, clean, and well kept 3 Bedroom 2 Bath condo located in the highly desirable Lakeford neighborhood in Merrifield, VA. This open, well-lit unit is perfect for both the young family or the working professional. The Master bedroom is very large- big enough for both a king size bed and all necessary furniture. It is equipped with both a walk-in closet as well as a double-sided sliding door closet, full bathroom with bath and shower, as well as washer and dryer units connected to the Master bath. Second bedroom is large as well and perfect for either a roommate or a growing child. Can comfortably fit a queen bed (possibly king). Third bedroom is a bit smaller but comfortably fits a double bed and possibly a queen. Was previously used as an office but has it's own window and closet.
Newly renovated kitchen comes with new electric stove/range, new range hood, and new refrigerator. Sink is equipped with well-functioning garbage disposal. Dining area is perfect for 4 but can seat 6 comfortably as well. Kitchen, dining area, and foyer has new cherry-maple flooring. 
Unit is located in a quiet neighborhood but is also walking distance to tons of restaurants, shopping and activities including the Mosaic District*, Jefferson Park, Dunn-Loring Metro station, downtown Merrifield, downtown Falls Church, multiple metro-bus stops and multiple grocery stores**. It is a short commute to Downtown DC or Tyson's Corner, with multiple routes to get on/off both 495 and 66. Neighborhood is backed up to Pine Spring Elementary school- allowing for extremely easy school drop-off. 
*Mosaic District offers: http://mosaicdistrict.com/
**Grocery Stores Include:
Harris Teeter (New- Dunn Loring Metro)
Safeway (West Falls Church Shopping Center)
HMart (Corner of Gallows/ Lee Hwy)
Safeway (Pan Am Shopping Center)
Great Wall of China Grocery store (Gallows Road)
Aldies (New Construction - open in 2018)
Further Amenities:
-Water payment is covered in your monthly payment
-Loose parking rules- no assigned spots but no max on spots you can take (within reason).
If interested, I also have a video of me walking through the unit with a Go-Pro on my head. Please respond to the email in this listing for more information. Thanks.

Description:
Spacious and light filled meticulously maintained & non-smoking home.
More about... The Condo:
~Boasting Hardwood Floors On Main Level.
~Neutral carpeting in the bedrooms.
~Built in bookshelves in living room.
~Bright and spacious kitchen with high ceilings.
~Separate formal dining room.
~Bright sunroom with wall of windows which opens to a beautiful private deck.
~Natural Gas fireplace.
~Vaulted Ceilings.
~2 Full baths.
~Abundant closet / storage space.
~Home Is Flooded With Natural Sun Light.
~Separate Laundry Room with Washer and Dryer.
Location
~Desired Willow Point Condominium.
~Right off the beltway, Route 50 and I-66 and I495
~11 miles to the heart of DC
~2.5 mi. to Dunn Loring/Merrifield Metro, and just under 1 mi. to the nearest Grocery
Store
~Metro/Fairfax Connector bus stop located at intx. of Jaguar and Arlington Blvd.
~7 mins drive to the MOSAIC town-center (Merrifield) restaurants and bars.
~Minutes away to Tyson's Mall.
~Heartbeat away to Seven corners, myriad of restaurants, tennis courts, hiking trails and recreational areas
~Assigned Parking + an abundance of visitor parking.
~Swimming Pool and on site recycling
~Short walk to Providence Recreation Center and a walking trail.
~Well manicured landscape & wooded community.
~Water, landscape, pool, trash and snow removal included in the rent.
Lease Terms
No Pets 
No Smoking 
Deposit 
Details will be provided on application approval.

Description:
Furnished 4 bed/3.5 bath townhouse avail October 1- hardwood floors, about 1 mile to metro 
* 3-4 bedrooms, 3.5 bath end unit townhouse 10 minutes from Arlington 
*4th bedroom on ground level or recreation room
* About 1 mile to East Falls Church metro
* One attached garage and one parking space in TH complex  plenty of street parking with no permit required
* Washer and dryer on ground level
* Central Air and heating with programmable thermostat
* Large master suite with luxurious separate shower, double sinks and Jacuzzi tub
* Lower level suite has a separate entrance with patio 
* Large kitchen with eat in breakfast area  dishwasher, stove top, double ovens, built in microwave
* Hardwood floors throughout house except in lower level suite 
* Large deck that is great for entertaining
* Walking distance to bus stop, grocery store, dry cleaner, shops
* Furnished rental $2,799/month + cleaning 
*Flat screen TVs in living room and master bedroom
* Available October 1  phone 703-587-4707 or email
* Smoke free house
* No pets 
* Cleaning service every 2 weeks $160/month
* See http://www.7oaks2.com for pictures and more details

Description: LEASING MID-NOVEMBER, MOVE IN JANUARY 2016! West Broad is more than an apartment community. It's a destination. It brings 286 well-appointed apartment homes, contemporary amenity spaces, an on-site Harris Teeter, and 2,500 square feet of additional retail space. It's a place where you want to call home and your friends will call to visit. With nearby farmer's markets, parks, trails, restaurants, and shops, West Broad is located in the established Little City region of Falls Church.

Address: [3012 Patrick Henry Dr, Falls Church, VA 22044](https://www.google.com/maps/dir/(paste+your+address+here,+it+should+be+however+google+formats+it,+for+example+for+the+Empire+State+Building+use+350+5th+Ave+New+York,+NY+10118)/3012+Patrick+Henry+Dr,+Falls+Church,+VA+22044/data=!4m2!4m1!3e2)

Description: Welcome to Hollybrooke Apartments. Our community is nestled in a vibrant neighborhood surrounded by shopping, dining, sprawling parks, bike trails, and plenty of entertainment. We have an ideal location for the lifestyle you want.Our apartment homes provide options to meet the needs of almost anyone looking for a new home. To make life easier, our homes are complete with sleek designs and spacious floorplans. We also offer lavish master bedrooms, spacious walk-in closets, large living rooms and gourmet kitchens with upgraded appliances. So you always feel like coming home is a joy, this meticulously landscaped community offers a professional onsite staff and 24 hour emergency maintenance. Located in prestigious Falls Church Virginia, only minutes from Washington DC attractions, fine restaurants, offices, shops and entertainment, this community has access to Washington DC's main arteries of I-395 and Hwy 50. Come home to quality and affordable Arlington Virginia apartment living! An AH

Description: At Olde Salem Village in Falls Church, VA, you'll not only find yourself surrounded by beautiful landscaping, thoughtfully-designed apartment homes, and enjoyable community amenities, you'll also be living in an exceptional area near shopping, dining, and entertainment. Located right on Route 7 near Leesburg Pike and Baileys Crossroads, Olde Salem Village is just minutes away from The Crossroads Shopping Center as well as all of the shopping, dining and entertainment that nearby Washington, DC has to offer. Olde Salem Village offers unique studio, one and two-bedroom apartment homes in addition to two bedroom townhomes. Start living the way you want to live with exclusive amenities such as on-site laundry care centers, a community playground, hardwood flooring, and spacious closets. This is apartment living at it's best. Must see this classic Pimmit Hills rambler on a quiet, charming cul-de-sac next to Pimmit Run parkland * Surrounded by mature trees, convenient to Tysons Corner, West Falls Church Metro, Marshall HS, Regional Library, McLean shopping, Trader Joe's and Whole Foods! Washer/Dryer inside, central AC! Large fenced back yard with shed, washer and dryer. No smoking, no pets.

Dining, entertainment and shopping are just minutes away at Pentagon City Mall and Washington DC. Spacious and unique one and two bedroom floor plans are available with great features such as hardwood floors and spacious rooms.The Carousel Court offers a convenient residential setting to complement an active life. Come home to quality and affordable Falls Church apartment living!An AHC Inc. Apartment Community

Description: In the heart of beautiful Falls Church, The Fields of Falls Church puts you right in the middle of one of the most dynamic locations in Northern Virginia. Surrounded by shopping and dining, The Fields of Falls Church offers you everything you want close to home. * 	Enjoy convenient access to I-495, Route 7 or I-66 * 	Find exceptional shopping, dining and entertainment in nearby Tysons Corner * 	Catch the bus to the West Falls Church Metro * 	Located near nationally rated local schools There is nothing quite as wonderful as coming home after a long day. At The Fields of Falls Church this is truer than ever before. Because here youll find a home full of comfort. A home thats designed to enrich your life while meeting your needs. Perhaps the first thing you notice is the way light flows freely from room to room, brightening every space. Then, theres the sense of relaxation, found in everything from the open designs to the great features, such as: * 	Plush, wall-to-wall carpeting * 	Some utilities included * 	Generous closet space * 	Abundant windows * 	Individually controlled heat and A/C Your home is your sanctuary and showroom. A place to rest quietly and a place to host friends. No matter your needs and no matter how they may change, youll find the home thats perfect for you at The Fields of Falls Church. The comforts of The Fields of Falls Church stretch far beyond your home. In fact, when you live here, youll find yourself surrounded by great amenities designed to help you enjoy more of every day. Youll have: * 	All-brick buildings surrounded by trees in a quiet, established neighborhood * 	Laundry centers conveniently located in each building * 	Cats and large dogs welcome
